title: How long will social media trends last? - Quora

response.answer_text: Social media will last forever. Only point is that they will take new forms all the time. Earlier, people could only gossip by sitting together physically as a group. Then they started gossiping on phones. Then texting started taking over as a gossip tool. Now we have Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp, etc. Only the form changes, not the gossip, which is the foundation on which all social media is built!
It will increase more and more day by day… Social Media is Clean Death to SEO by Shout Me About
